name: Spiderette Solitaire HD
description:
Spiderette is a small solitaire. Clean cards and great graphics in this edition allow you to play for hours in one of the less known, but still very interesting solitaires.

Rules:
- one deck instead of two,
- clicking on piles on the right deals new cards,
- you have to build sequences from King to Ace,
- moving requires the card to be in sequence and follow suit.

Features:
- undo,
- saving state,
- 1, 2 and 4 suit modes (easy, medium, hard),
- restarting the same game.
